fields.name: Fantasy
fields.description: Fantasy literature featuring magical or supernatural elements.

fields.name: Dystopian Fiction
fields.description: Literature set in societies where life is miserable, characterized by human misery, squalor, oppression, disease, and overcrowding.

fields.name: Mystery
fields.description: Fiction dealing with the solution of a crime or the unraveling of secrets.

fields.name: Science Fiction
fields.description: Fiction based on futuristic concepts such as advanced science and technology, space exploration, time travel, parallel universes, and extraterrestrial life.

fields.name: Classic Literature
fields.description: Literature that has been accepted as being exemplary or noteworthy for its artistic merit.
